results.content: The instruction lecture was crystal clear. It showed one by one steps, one after the others. If I don't fully understand now, I still proceed as I can easily come back later in the future to really follow it. I am very happy with the teaching approach.

results.content:
The only thing to let down this course, in my opinion, was the old fashioned design of the site. It would have benefited enormously from a more adventurous look.
In all other aspects the course was clearly presented and I learnt quite a lot along the way.
results.content_html:
The only thing to let down this course, in my opinion, was the old fashioned design of the site. It would have benefited enormously from a more adventurous look.

results.content:
Very thorough and an excellent launching point for anyone interested in building their own themes. Covers the absolute fundamentals plus some really great strategies for building a theme using an existing website design.

I especially appreciate the use of Wordpress documentation when showing how to pull template paths / titles / site content / etc. Shows a very practical way of how the documentation can help as a theme developer.
results.content_html:
Very thorough and an excellent launching point for anyone interested in building their own themes. Covers the absolute fundamentals plus some really great strategies for building a theme using an existing website design.

I especially appreciate the use of Wordpress documentation when showing how to pull template paths / titles / site content / etc. Shows a very practical way of how the documentation can help as a theme developer.

results.content: I enjoyed the course. However, there's more to the basics than what is covered. I made a dynamic website, but I was hoping to make a blogging site, which is what wordpress is used for. I found myself going back to the wordpress website to figure things out.
results.content_html: I enjoyed the course. However, there's more to the basics than what is covered. I made a dynamic website, but I was hoping to make a blogging site, which is what wordpress is used for. I found myself going back to the wordpress website to figure things out.

results.content: The material is great and easy to follow. The only trouble I had was in knowing how to set up wordpress on my hosting site.
